GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article based on its id number

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: serves an array of comments for a chosen article id

comments.author: icellusedkars
comments.body: Replacing the quiet elegance of the dark suit and tie with the casual indifference of these muted earth tones is a form of fashion suicide, but, uh, call me crazy — onyou it works.'

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: serves an array of comments for a chosen article id, with the newest comment first

comments.author: icellusedkars
comments.body: Replacing the quiet elegance of the dark suit and tie with the casual indifference of these muted earth tones is a form of fashion suicide, but, uh, call me crazy — onyou it works.'

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to an article and responds with the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: for a specified article id, creates an updated vote count based on a passed increment value

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment stated in the comment ID
